TextView.android:text:
This application is in TESTING PHASE as part of Master's Thesis.
 Please use fake/not-existing e-mail address for registration - no e-mail verification is performed in TESTING PHASE.
 This application gathers and uses set of parameters (provided by user), location data (gathered from your phone GPS) and heart rate data (gathered from Bluetooth Heart Rate monitor supporting Bluetooth standard for heart rate measurement) to perform evaluation of '6 Minute Walk Test'. By installing TEST VERSION of this application and registering you agree to gathering and processing of information mentioned above.
 After TESTING PHASE all user data that is gathered and used by application will be deleted. After data deletion none of previously registered users will be able to log into application.
